import React, { useState } from 'react' import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid' const Addtransaction = () => { const [income, setincome] = useState({ incometext: '', incomeamount: 0, }) const onchangeincome = e => { setincome([e.target.name], e.target.value) } return (
) } export default Addtransaction
